fullText: If the first 10 minutes of a show are supposed to rope you in, “The Who’s Tommy” dares you to need more than 10 seconds. Director Des McAnuff’s revival staging of the electric rock opera he co-wrote explodes onto the Nederlander Theatre stage in a paroxysm of booming sound, blinding light and crackling projections

keyPhrases.quote: dares you to need more than 10 seconds
explodes onto the Nederlander Theatre stage in a paroxysm of booming sound, blinding light and crackling projections
